title: 103_hr1014
content: Expansion of state option to exclude service of election officials or election workers from coverage. Expansion of state option to exclude service of election officials or election workers from coverage. Amendment to the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the exempt remuneration amount to $1,000 for service performed during 1994 and thereafter. The exempt remuneration amount for service performed during 1994 and thereafter is increased to $1,000 under amendments to the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. The exempt remuneration amount for service performed during 1994 and thereafter is increased to $1,000 under amendments to the Social Security Act. The Secretary determines and publishes the exempt remuneration amount annually, effective for service performed in the following calendar year. The Secretary annually determines the exempt remuneration amount based on a formula involving total wages and indexing ratios. The Secretary of the Treasury determines the exempt remuneration amount annually based on a formula involving total wages and indexing ratios. Amendments made to the Act will apply to service performed on or after January 1, 1994.
